welcomeMessage.en: Welcome to your luxury retreat in Palm Jumeirah!
welcomeMessage.ar: مرحباً بكم في ملاذكم الفاخر في نخلة جميرا!

directions.en:
The building is located at the corner of the street with a glass door entrance. Underground parking is available. The studio is on the 1st floor, first door to the left of the elevator (no apartment number).

If you need anything, contact me through the app and I will respond quickly, God willing. 🙏
directions.ar:
العمارة في زاوية الشارع والمدخل حقها بابه قزاز وفيه مواقف تحت الارض، الاستديو موجود في الدور رقم (1) ورح يكون اول باب يسار المصعد (ما فيه رقم شقه)

اذا احتجت اي شي تواصل معي بالبرنامج ورح ارد عليك سريع بإذن الله. 🙏

description.en: Just 15 minutes away - the world's largest shopping mall!
description.ar: على بعد 15 دقيقة فقط - أكبر مركز تسوق في العالم!

houseRules.title: No Smoking
houseRules.description: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the property

houseRules.title: Quiet Hours
houseRules.description: Please maintain quiet between 10 PM and 7 AM

houseRules.title: Max Guests
houseRules.description: Maximum 4 guests allowed in the property

houseRules.title: No Pets
houseRules.description: Pets are not allowed in this property

houseRules.title: No Parties
houseRules.description: Parties and events are not permitted

houseRules.title: Keep it Clean
houseRules.description: Please maintain the cleanliness of the property

houseRules.title: Check-out Time
houseRules.description: Please check out by 11 AM on your departure day

houseRules.title: Have Fun!
houseRules.description: Enjoy your stay and make great memories

name.ar: شقة حديثة في وسط مدينة دبي
